translations.You do not have access to this file: Sizda ushbu fayldan foydalanishda ruxsat yo'q
translations.This element is not shared with any user: Bu element uni tasdiqlash vakolatiga ega bo'lgan hech bir foydalanuvchi bilan ulashilmagan.
translations.Approval has already been requested with: Ushbu fayl uchun ushbu tartib bo'yicha tasdiqlash allaqachon so'ralgan
translations.You are not authorized to request with t: Siz ushbu tartib bo'yicha so'rov berishga vakolatli emassiz
translations.Let users approve or reject files: Foydalanuvchilarga fayllarni tasdiqlash yoki rad etishga ruxsat bering
translations.Approve/reject files based on workflows:
Administratorlar tomonidan belgilangan ish oqimlari asosida fayllarni tasdiqlash/rad etish.

**Ogohlantirish**: DocuSign integratsiyasi endi ushbu ilovaning bir qismi emas va uni [this app](https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/integration_docusign).
translations.All tags must be different: Barcha teglar bir biridan farqli bo'lishi kerak
translations.Pending tag is already used in another w: Kutilayotgan teg allaqachon boshqa ish jarayonida ishlatilgan
translations.Failed to save approval workflow: Tasdiqlash ish jarayonini saqlashda xatolik yuz berdi
translations.Failed to delete approval workflow: Tasdiqlash ish jarayonini o'chirishda xatolik yuz berdi
translations.Each workflow defines who (which users,: Har bir ish jarayoni berilgan kutilayotgan teg uchun fayllarni kim (qaysi foydalanuvchilar, guruhlar yoki doiralar) tasdiqlashi mumkinligini va keyin qaysi tasdiqlangan/rad etilgan teg tayinlanishi kerakligini belgilaydi.
translations.A list of users/groups/circles who can m: Qo'lda tasdiqlashni so'rashi mumkin bo'lgan foydalanuvchilar/guruhlar/doiralar ro'yxati ixtiyoriy ravishda belgilanishi mumkin.
translations.To be considered approved, a file/direct: Tasdiqlangan deb hisoblanishi uchun, bir nechta kutilayotgan teglarga ega fayl/katalog barcha ish oqimlari tomonidan tasdiqlanishi kerak.
translations.You can chain approval workflows by usin: Boshqa ish oqimida kutilayotgan tegni tasdiqlangan/rad etilgan teg sifatida ishlatish orqali tasdiqlash ish oqimlarini zanjirlashingiz mumkin.
translations.All tags must be different in a workflow: Ish jarayonida barcha teglar har xil bo'lishi kerak. Kutilayotgan teg faqat bitta ish jarayonida ishlatilishi mumkin.
translations.Who can request approval: Kimlarga tasdiqlash so'rvoni yaratish ruxsati berilgan
translations.Remove file approval when file is modifi: Fayl o'zgartirilganda faylni tasdiqlashni bekor qilish
translations.There is no approval workflow allowing y: Tasdiqlashni so'rashga imkon beruvchi tasdiqlash jarayoni yo'q.
translations.File will be automatically shared with e: Fayl avtomatik ravishda tasdiqlashga ruxsat berilgan barcha bilan ulashiladi.
translations.Waiting for authorized users to approve: Vakolatli foydalanuvchilarning ushbu faylni tasdiqlashi kutilmoqda
translations.Pending approval, click to approve/rejec: Tasdiqlash kutilmoqda, tasdiqlash/rad etish uchun bosing
translations.This element was approved:
Tasdiqlash kutilmoqda, tasdiqlash/rad etish uchun bosing.
Ushbu element tasdiqlandi
